results.description:
The masterpiece that started Terry Goodkind's New York Times bestselling epic Sword of Truth

In the aftermath of the brutal murder of his father, a mysterious woman, Kahlan Amnell, appears in Richard Cypher's forest sanctuary seeking help...and more.

schema_notes.asin: String - Audible ASIN (B0XXXXXXXX format for English, different for other regions)
schema_notes.series: Array<{series: string, sequence: string}> | null - Series info when applicable
schema_notes.subtitle: String | null - Often contains 'Series, Book N' for series books
schema_notes.abridged: Boolean - Whether the audiobook is abridged
schema_notes.region: String - Audible region code (us, uk, etc.)
